resources.string: Calculate Required Grade in the Final
The "Current Grade in the class" is the overall grade that you hold at this moment in the class. You have the option betwwen a value in percentage or as a letter grade.
The "Final coefficient" is the weight of the final usually given in your sylabus in percentage.
The "Desired Grade in the class" is the grade that you want to obtain in the class. You have the option between a value in percentage or as a letter Grade.
You can change the Scale of grading (if your sylabus scale is different)
